argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f r s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-rngisom | |- RngIsom = ( r e. _V , s e. _V |-> { f e. ( r RngHomo s ) | `' f e. ( s RngHomo r ) } ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> RngIsom = ( r e. _V , s e. _V |-> { f e. ( r RngHomo s ) | `' f e. ( s RngHomo r ) } ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( r RngHomo s ) = ( R RngHomo S ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) /\ ( r = R /\ s = S ) ) -> ( r RngHomo s ) = ( R RngHomo S ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( s = S /\ r = R ) -> ( s RngHomo r ) = ( S RngHomo R ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( s RngHomo r ) = ( S RngHomo R ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) /\ ( r = R /\ s = S ) ) -> ( s RngHomo r ) = ( S RngHomo R ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) /\ ( r = R /\ s = S ) ) -> ( `' f e. ( s RngHomo r ) <-> `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) /\ ( r = R /\ s = S ) ) -> { f e. ( r RngHomo s ) | `' f e. ( s RngHomo r ) } = { f e. ( R RngHomo S ) | `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) } ) |
| 10 |  | #P_elex | |- ( R e. V -> R e. _V ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> R e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_elex | |- ( S e. W -> S e. _V ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> S e. _V ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( R RngHomo S ) e. _V |
| 15 | 14 | #P_rabex | |- { f e. ( R RngHomo S ) | `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) } e. _V |
| 16 | 15 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> { f e. ( R RngHomo S ) | `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) } e. _V ) |
| 17 | 2, 9, 11, 13, 16 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> ( R RngIsom S ) = { f e. ( R RngHomo S ) | `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) } ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> ( F e. ( R RngIsom S ) <-> F e. { f e. ( R RngHomo S ) | `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) } ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_cnveq | |- ( f = F -> `' f = `' F ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( f = F -> ( `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) <-> `' F e. ( S RngHomo R ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_elrab | |- ( F e. { f e. ( R RngHomo S ) | `' f e. ( S RngHomo R ) } <-> ( F e. ( R RngHomo S ) /\ `' F e. ( S RngHomo R ) ) ) |
| 22 | 18, 21 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) -> ( F e. ( R RngIsom S ) <-> ( F e. ( R RngHomo S ) /\ `' F e. ( S RngHomo R ) ) ) ) |
